tool_description: Validates and normalizes check-in and check-out dates, ensuring they meet booking requirements and calculating stay duration.
error_messages: Invalid date format: Provide dates in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Check-in date must be in the future: Bookings cannot be made for past dates.
Check-out date must be after check-in date: Ensure the date range is valid.
Stay duration too long: Maximum stay duration is 365 days.
Stay duration too short: Minimum stay duration is 1 day.
usage: Provide valid check_in_date and check_out_date in ISO format. The tool validates the date range and returns normalized booking dates.

nights_count.description: Number of nights for the stay

is_valid.description: Whether the date range is valid for booking
